name: The Last Outpost (Joror)
description:
The Harvester is Here. The World is Ending. Can you survive long enough to get out of There?

CONTROLS: Click & Drag - Scroll Zoom 
GAMEPLAY:  Build Economy & Fight Monsters
Hit Escape for Menu & Tips!

Economy Tips
  • Residents need houses! Put them in tents if you have to.
  • Check out the buildings tab in the bottom right
  • Food is Life
Combat Tips
  • Residents heal up in houses
  • Gang up on Monsters if you can
  • Hover over buttons for hints and controls
  • AWSD works!
The Story

We remember the time before the Harvester came. Before the Gods and their chosen started leaving. 

That was a long time ago. Now the land is charred and blackened - abominations roam the lands.  The World is Ending.

You run The Last Outpost near the Wastes - where Alesh, a minor God, still listens...

Survive long enough, and perhaps They will grant you their Final Blessing.

The Visuals

Kenney's Micro Roguelike tiles + many new tiles by myself:https://www.kenney.nl/assets/micro-roguelike
